rows.name: Jarred Arm
rows.description: Your arm is jarred in the attack. Drop whatever was held in that hand.

rows.name: Minor Arm Cut
rows.description: Gain a Bleeding Condition as your upper arm is cut badly.

rows.name: Sprain
rows.description: You sprain your arm, suffering a Torn Muscle (Minor) injury.

rows.name: Badly Jarred Arm
rows.description: Your arm is badly jarred in the attack. Drop whatever was held in that hand, which is useless for @Roll[1d10] - Toughness Bonus Rounds (minimum 1). For this time, treat the hand as lost.

rows.name: Torn Muscles
rows.description: The blow slams into your forearm. Gain a Bleeding Condition and a Torn Muscle (Minor) injury.

rows.name: Bleeding hand
rows.description: Your hand is cut badly, making your grip slippery. Take 1 Bleeding Condition. While suffering from that Bleeding Condition, make an Average (+20) Dexterity Test before taking any Action that requires something being held in that hand; if you fail, the item slips from your grip.

rows.name: Wrenched Arm
rows.description: Your arm is almost pulled from its socket. Drop whatever is held in the associated hand; the arm is useless for @Roll[1d10] Rounds.

rows.name: Gaping Arm Wound
rows.description: The blow opens a deep, gaping wound. Gain 2 Bleeding Conditions. Until you receive Surgery to stitch up the cut, any associated Arm Damage you receive will also inflict 1 Bleeding Condition as the wound reopens.

rows.name: Clean Break
rows.description: An audible crack resounds as the blow strikes your arm. Drop whatever was held in the associated hand and gain a Broken Bone (Minor) injury. Pass a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test or gain a Stunned Condition.

rows.name: Ruptered Ligament
rows.description: You immediately drop whatever was held in that hand. Suffer a Torn Muscle(Major) injury.

rows.name: Deep Cut
rows.description: Gain 2 Bleeding Conditions as your arm is mangled. Gain 1 Stunned Condition and suffer a Torn Muscle (Minor) injury. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Unconscious Condition.

rows.name: Damaged Artery
rows.description: Gain 4 Bleeding Conditions. Until you receive Surgery, every time you take Damage to this Arm Hit Location gain 2 Bleeding Conditions.

rows.name: Crushed Elbow
rows.description: The blow crushes your elbow, splintering bone and cartilage. You immediately drop whatever was held in that hand and gain a Broken Bone (Major) injury.

rows.name: Dislocated Shoulder
rows.description: Your arm is wrenched out of its socket. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Stunned and Prone Condition. Drop whatever is held in that hand: the arm is useless and counts as lost (see Amputated Part). Gain 1 Stunned Condition until you receive Medical Attention. After this initial Medical Attention, an Extended Average (+20) Heal Test needing 6 SL is required to reset the arm, at which point you regain its use. Tests made using this arm suffer a -10 penalty for @Roll[1d10] days.

rows.name: Severed Finger
rows.description: You gape in horror as a finger flies — Amputation (Average). Gain a Bleeding condition.

rows.name: Cleft Hand
rows.description: Your hand splays open from the blow. Lose 1 finger — Amputation (Difficult). Gain 2 Bleeding and 1 Stunned Condition. For every succeeding Round in which you don't receive Medical Attention, you lose another finger as the wound tears; if you run out of fingers, you lose the hand — Amputation (Difficult).

rows.name: Mauled Bicep
rows.description: The blow almost separates bicep and tendon from bone, leaving an ugly wound that sprays blood over you and your opponent. You automatically drop anything held in the associated hand and suffers a Torn Muscle (Major) injury and 2 Bleeding and 1 Stunned Condition.

rows.name: Mangled Hand
rows.description: Your hand is left a mauled, bleeding mess. You lose your hand — Amputation (Hard). Gain 2 Bleeding Condition. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Stunned and Prone Conditions.

rows.name: Sliced Tendons
rows.description: Your tendons are cut by the blow, leaving your arm hanging useless — Amputation (Very Hard). Gain 3 Bleeding, 1 Prone, and 1 Stunned Condition. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Unconscious Condition.

rows.name: Brutal Dismemberment
rows.description: Your arm is severed, spraying arterial blood @Roll[1d10] feet in a random direction (see Scatter), before the blow follows through to your chest.
